reviewText: Surf's Up and Monster House both surprised me.  Very well made with humor for kids and adults.  I think the best of these movies entertain all ages and all three of these movies do that.  I think Monster House is fine for kids - at least it was so in my family.  My six year old daughter loved it as did a number of her classmates.  Amazon's current price for the bundle is not so attractive.  Better deal if you purchase them individually.

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001HZ59IK/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title

We purchased this bundle during christmas for the family.  Surf's up and Open house were good and Monster house was not good for the kids.  I am not sure why they included that for us to buy possibly because it was not selling standalone DVD.  I would buy them seapartely if I know what I know now.

We used Surf's up most of the time and not the other two.
